title: Crediton Dairy announces £20m investment programme - FoodManufacture.co.uk
summary: Crediton Dairy, an independent drinks manufacturer based in Devon, has announced a £20m investment in its operations over the next three years. This investment will include upgrades to its processing capabilities, initiatives to reduce its carbon footprint, and the development of new employee facilities. The dairy has seen strong growth in recent years, with turnover increasing from £101.5m in 2021 to £114.1m in 2022.
greenwashing: The article does not provide any evidence to suggest that the investment is an example of greenwashing.
